verses.verse: I lifted up <S%H5375><s%> mine eyes <S%H5869><s%> again, and looked, <S%H7200><s%> and behold <S%H2009><s%> a man <S%H376><s%> with a measuring <S%H4060><s%> line <S%H2256><s%> in his hand. <S%H3027><s%>

Then said <S%H559><s%> I, Whither <S%H575><s%> goest <S%H1980><s%> thou? <S%H859><s%> And he said <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> me, To measure <S%H4058><s%> <S%H853><s%> Jerusalem, <S%H3389><s%> to see <S%H7200><s%> what <S%H4100><s%> is the breadth <S%H7341><s%> thereof, and what <S%H4100><s%> is the length <S%H753><s%> thereof.

And, behold, <S%H2009><s%> the angel <S%H4397><s%> that talked <S%H1696><s%> with me went forth, <S%H3318><s%> and another <S%H312><s%> angel <S%H4397><s%> went out <S%H3318><s%> to meet <S%H7125><s%> him,

And said <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> him, Run, <S%H7323><s%> speak <S%H1696><s%> to <S%H413><s%> this <S%H1975><s%> young man, <S%H5288><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%> shall be inhabited <S%H3427><s%> as towns without walls <S%H6519><s%> for the multitude <S%H4480><s%> <S%H7230><s%> of men <S%H120><s%> and cattle <S%H929><s%> therein: <S%H8432><s%>

For I, <S%H589><s%> saith <S%H5002><s%> the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> will be <S%H1961><s%> unto her a wall <S%H2346><s%> of fire <S%H784><s%> round about, <S%H5439><s%> and will be <S%H1961><s%> the glory <S%H3519><s%> in the midst <S%H8432><s%> of her.

Ho, <S%H1945><s%> ho, <S%H1945><s%> come forth, and flee <S%H5127><s%> from the land <S%H4480><s%> <S%H776><s%> of the north, <S%H6828><s%> saith <S%H5002><s%> the LORD: <S%H3068><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> I have spread you abroad <S%H6566><s%> <S%H853><s%> as the four <S%H702><s%> winds <S%H7307><s%> of the heaven, <S%H8064><s%> saith <S%H5002><s%> the LORD. <S%H3068><s%>
Deliver thyself, <S%H4422><s%> O <S%H1945><s%> Zion, <S%H6726><s%> that dwellest <S%H3427><s%> with the daughter <S%H1323><s%> of Babylon. <S%H894><s%>

For <S%H3588><s%> thus <S%H3541><s%> saith <S%H559><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> of hosts; <S%H6635><s%> After <S%H310><s%> the glory <S%H3519><s%> hath he sent <S%H7971><s%> me unto <S%H413><s%> the nations <S%H1471><s%> which spoiled <S%H7997><s%> you: for <S%H3588><s%> he that toucheth <S%H5060><s%> you toucheth <S%H5060><s%> the apple <S%H892><s%> of his eye. <S%H5869><s%>

For, <S%H3588><s%> behold, <S%H2009><s%> I will shake <S%H5130><s%> <S%H853><s%> mine hand <S%H3027><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> them, and they shall be <S%H1961><s%> a spoil <S%H7998><s%> to their servants: <S%H5650><s%> and ye shall know <S%H3045><s%> that <S%H3588><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> of hosts <S%H6635><s%> hath sent <S%H7971><s%> me.

Sing <S%H7442><s%> and rejoice, <S%H8055><s%> O daughter <S%H1323><s%> of Zion: <S%H6726><s%> for, <S%H3588><s%> lo, <S%H2009><s%> I come, <S%H935><s%> and I will dwell <S%H7931><s%> in the midst <S%H8432><s%> of thee, saith <S%H5002><s%> the LORD. <S%H3068><s%>

And many <S%H7227><s%> nations <S%H1471><s%> shall be joined <S%H3867><s%> to <S%H413><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> in that <S%H1931><s%> day, <S%H3117><s%> and shall be <S%H1961><s%> my people: <S%H5971><s%> and I will dwell <S%H7931><s%> in the midst <S%H8432><s%> of thee, and thou shalt know <S%H3045><s%> that <S%H3588><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> of hosts <S%H6635><s%> hath sent <S%H7971><s%> me unto <S%H413><s%> thee.

And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> shall inherit <S%H5157><s%> <S%H853><s%> Judah <S%H3063><s%> his portion <S%H2506><s%> in <S%H5921><s%> the holy <S%H6944><s%> land, <S%H127><s%> and shall choose <S%H977><s%> Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%> again. <S%H5750><s%>

Be silent, <S%H2013><s%> O all <S%H3605><s%> flesh, <S%H1320><s%> before <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6440><s%> the LORD: <S%H3068><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> he is raised up <S%H5782><s%> out of his holy <S%H6944><s%> habitation. <S%H4480><s%> <S%H4583><s%>
